name: Grok
description:
Grok is an independent, full-service, integrated agency located in NYC’s Flatiron District, with over 25 employees and $75 million in billings. 
Founded in 2009 by advertising veterans Julie Bauer, Steve Landsberg and Tod Seisser, Grok was named one of America’s fastest-growing companies, three years in a row, by Inc. Magazine, who called us “giant killers” because we have a proven track record of helping challenger brands, of any size, compete and win.
